mapper.insert: insert into coupons(merchant_id, title, summary, `desc`, `limit`, has_token, background, start, end) values (#{merchantId}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{desc}, #{limit}, #{hasToken}, #{background}, #{start}, #{end})
mapper.select: select id, merchant_id as merchantId, title, summary, `desc`, `limit`, has_token as hasToken, background, start, end from coupons where id = #{couponId}
mapper.update: update coupons set merchant_id = #{merchantId}, title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, `desc` = #{desc}, `limit` = #{limit}, has_token = #{hasToken}, background = #{background}, start = #{start}, end = #{end} where id = #{id}
